fixes.name: mod US MM
fixes.dax_expression: IF('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "SFB", 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * -1, 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level IF from Tableau to a DAX calculated column using IF(). Preserved exact column and table names and string literal formatting.

fixes.name: USD all
fixes.dax_expression: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[PV US MM] + 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[mod US MM]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level addition to a DAX calculated column by summing the PV US MM column and the previously created mod US MM calculated column. Column references formatted as 'TableName'[Column].
